reviewText: Love the Hulu version so I bought this dvd. Doesn't have the earth portion but no complaints here

Very cool. I bought this for my Father-in-law as part of his Christmas gift. We all watched it together. Very informative. One cannot believe how big all of these are and this video puts them into perspective

Big Stuff Purchased DVD because I had the privilage to operate one of the pieces of equipment in the DVD. Thought it was very informitive for both children and adults. I informed my friends and suggested they buy it. John Myott
